subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Claude Giroux, Matt Read and Jakub Voracek combined for 3 goals and 10 points, helping the Philadelphia Flyers break a slump with a 7-0 victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Claude Giroux, Matt Read and Jakub Voracek combined for 3 goals and 10 points, helping the Philadelphia Flyers break a slump with a 7-0 victory over the Islanders.
